unnormalised: Borem, tor konnak tori khorench differential calculus *somzunk* zai? Kamar kas, bhai, Mumbai-antli auto-rickshaw patti porosui he ek borea prokaran cholonk axa! Gambhirponnan sangta, tor tumchea class 12 chya physics shikshakan dakhoilem te porosum bhirant divpi nhoi. Tem kiteim abstract mathematical voodoo mhonn chintunakai ani tem… tumchi chai kitlea vegim thondd zata, vo Amazon.in-acher shopping kelea uprant tumchem bank balance kitlea vegim gayab zata, tem sodhun kaddop. Tem sogllem bodlacho dar kitlea vegim asa tacher nirbhor asa.
normalised: Boro, konnachen-ui differential calculus somzunk zata kai? Kamar kas, bhai, Mumbai-nt auto-rickshaw-ichea fattlavon-ui an'ni ekdom vaild zavnk vota! Seriously mhunttlear-ui, tumchea Class bara-chea physics teacher-in taka jem dakoilem ten'nach bhiranticher na. Tem khoincho abstract mathematical voodoo mhunn chintunk naka ani tench tumchea chai kitlem begin thondd zata mhunn zanna zavnk, vo Amazon dot in-cher shopping spree kel'lea uprant tumchem bank balance kitlem begin vanish zata, mhunn chint. Soglle bodlachem rate-vishim asa.

unnormalised: Dhôr, tumi samosa-che veshni zatat. Tumi tannek 2 samosa dor minttak khevpak suru kortat. Punn uprant, tikhen mar korunk lagta, ani tumi holuch cholonk lagtat. Differential calculus tumchea samosa khayecho dar kitlea vegim bodlota mhonn *thoddeach* vellar kitlem bodlota tem sodhun kaddunk maddot korta. Tem vegim poddta? Tem samaan zata? Tem tumchea samosa ghenk speedometer aslea sarke! Hem, mhojea ixttank, derivative mhonn sangtat.
normalised: Tumka samosa-chi addiction asa mhunn manta. Tum tankam eka rate-an khaoita, mhunn manta, don samosa dar minute. Punn ten'na, masala lagta, ani tum begin kamkarta. Differential calculus tumka exact-ui kitlem tumchem samosa consumption rate kitlem bodlota, tankam zanna zavnk maddat korta. Tem begin kam zavta kai? Tem leveling off zavta kai? Tumchea samosa intake-achek speedometer aslolea sarkeem! Haka, mhoje ixtta, derivative mhunn mhunn'tta.

unnormalised: Formally, ek function-achem derivative ek point-acher basicamente tumkam tea point-acher tangent line-achem slope sangta. Atam, maka khobor asa tem textbook mumbo jumbo sarkem dista mhonn. Dhôr tumi Delhi-thavn Agra-meren gaddye cholounchea vellar tumchi speed-acho graph kaddtat. Tea graph-achea konnaichei point-acher derivative tumkam sangta tumi kitlea vegim cholonk ani kitlea vegim holuch cholonk lagle tea *thoddeach* second-acher. Tor zori slope 0 asa, tor tumi vegim vo holuch cholonk lagna.
normalised: Formally, eka function-chem derivative eka point-icher tumka tangent line-ichem slope dakoita. Ata, mhuka mahit asa tem textbook mumbo jumbo mhunn asta. Tum Delhi-chon Agra-chea driving karta tednachem speed-ichem graph kaddta mhunn imagina kara. Graph-ichea konnachen-ui point-icher derivative tumka tem second-ak tum kitlem accelerate vo decelerate kortale mhunn dakoita. Ani slope zero aslear, tum accelerate kortana va decelerate kortana na mhunn asta.

unnormalised: Tachi bhov real world applications asat. Economics-acho vichar kora: tumcho faido kitlea vegim vaddoita, tem sogllei mahatvachem sales vs ad spends. Computer science-acho vichar kora: tumi kitea bhaxen ek neural net bhov borean optimize korunk ani tacho loss function khoroch korunk xokta, zor tumchem cute cat generator borem asa tor. Weather forecasting-acho vichar kora: Bangalore-antlem temperature dusrea 30 minttanim kitea bhaxen bodlotolem. Tor tem bhov upyogi asa, torui dislem tori fuktachya numbers sarkem.
normalised: Khub real world application asat. Economics chint: tumchem profit kitlem begin vaddaota, tea soglle mahatvache rate of sales versus ad spends. Computer science chint: tum ek neural net koxem optimize korunk zata ani tumchea cute cat generator-ak chodd cuter korunk zata? Weather forecasting chint: Bangalore-ntlea temperature-ak thoddea minutean koxem bodol zavnk vota. Mhunnun tem eka point-ichem number na zalear-ui, tem ekdom vaprant yeta.

unnormalised: Notation vixim chinta korunk naka. Tumi dy/dx, f'(x), D(x) - he kitem tori dekhtele, tankam soglleank ekuch orth asa: "derivative sodhun kadda!". Ani tumi azun guchpondn poddlet zalear, YouTube tumcho ixtt asa. Fuddem mhonn zata "integral calculus zaituch kathin asa!", tor "differential calculus explained in Hindi" vo "Khan Academy differential calculus" sodhun kadda, ani tumi zagritponnan explanations-ant budtel. Ani yaad dovrat, thodde chai ani samosa kiteim concept xikonk zaituch bore bhaxen toyar kortat. Bori nashib ani yaad dovrat chintinaka, hem maths asa tekhai.
normalised: Notation vishim chodd chinta korunk naka. Tum d y divided by d x, f prime of x, D of x polaita -- tankam soglleanchem ekuch arth asa: "derivative sod". Ani tumaka atun-ui confused laglear, YouTube tumcho ixtt asa. Tum "differential calculus explained in Hindi" vo "Khan Academy differential calculus" search kor ani tum "integral calculus an'ni-ui kathin asa" mhunn mhunnpak zavnchea porosui begin explanations-icher swimming kortole! Ani eka thoddea chai ani samosa konnachen-ui concept sodd korunk chodd fun zata mhunn dhor. Good luck ani chodd stress korunk nant mhunn zanna dovra, him Maths at the end of the day mhunn.
